general_advice: Patch Test First: Before introducing any new product, apply a small amount to a discreet area of skin (like behind your ear) for 2-3 days to check for any irritation.
Consistency is Key: Skincare results, especially for pigmentation and texture, take time. Stick with the routine for at least 8-12 weeks to see meaningful changes.

Listen to Your Skin: If your skin feels overly dry, tight, or irritated, take an extra recovery day. Skin cycling is flexible; the goal is to get the benefits of the actives without compromising your skin barrier.
Sunscreen is Non-Negotiable: The most effective way to prevent new pigmentation and protect your skin from aging is to wear sunscreen daily, even on cloudy days.
